Carrers@Imagimation

We are currently actively seeking very talented and fun-loving stop motion animation, cg animation, traditional animation, visual effects, creature & animatronic, and live action production individuals to be a creative part of Hal Miles Imagimation Studios.

If you feel that you would like to work at a fun-loving studio, and work on some of the most imaginative projects being produced, then we are the studio to apply to.

Please contact us with your current web site address and any additional information or materials on yourself or your skills. Once we look at them, unlike other studios, we promise that weâ€™ll personally contact you.
